sentence.Network_en: His remarks injected a note of levity into the proceedings.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的话将一丝轻率带入了议事过程中.

sentence.Network_en: Your levity is unseemly at this time.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这种场合,你的轻率举动是不得体的.

sentence.Network_en: At the time, Arnold had disapproved of such levity.
sentence.Network_cn: 那时候的阿诺德对这种轻浮行为很看不惯。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以l开头的英语英文单词 ... leviathan 大海兽，巨大之物 levity 轻率；轻浮；变化无常 levy 征税、征兵.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... levitate v 使升在空中 levity n 轻浮 levy v 征税.
克斯汀·邓斯特 - 维基百科，自由的百科全书 ... 神鬼帝国 Kaena:The Prophecy 率性 Levity 网住爱情 Wimbledon.
以l开头的英语英文单词 ... leviathan 大海兽，巨大之物 levity 轻率；轻浮；变化无常 levy 征税、征兵.

list.abs: It was cruel levity in you to do that ., 那本是你狠心轻薄的行为.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin levitas, from levis 'light'

entry.def: Levity is behaviour that shows a tendency to treat serious matters in a non-serious way.

example.ex: At the time, Arnold had disapproved of such levity.
example.tran: 那时候的阿诺德对这种轻浮行为很看不惯。

means.word_mean: 1. feeling an inappropriate lack of seriousness

auth_sentence.content: But politics...cannot be treated with levity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But politics...cannot be treated with levity.

auth_sentence.content: Morecambe would then provide levity with a whoopee cushion joke.
auth_sentence.res_content: Morecambe would then provide levity with a whoopee cushion joke.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Morecambe would then provide levity with a whoopee cushion joke.

auth_sentence.content: Naturally such weighty topics are flecked with levity and light.
auth_sentence.res_content: Naturally such weighty topics are flecked with levity and light.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Naturally such weighty topics are flecked with levity and light.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不相干的,离题的,与……不相干
stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+relevant[adj.有关的,中肯的,相应的,实质性的]→adj.不相干的,离题的,与……不相干

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有关的,中肯的,相应的,实质性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+lev举起,变轻+ant……的→再举起→有关的
elevate[v.举起,提拔,振奋,提升……的职位]+or器→n.电梯,升降机
lev举起,变轻+er表名词→举起[重东西]的东西
lever[n.杆,杠杆,手段,途径,工具]+age状态→n.杠杆作用
lev举起,变轻+ity表名词→n.轻率,轻浮
lev举起,变轻+y→提升[税]:to raise tax
al一再+lev举起,变轻+iate表动词→不断轻→减轻

stems_affixes.value_cn: 举起,提拔,振奋,提升……的职位
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+lev举起,变轻+ate表动词→举出→升高
lev举起,变轻+it+ate表动词→使东西举起→升到空中
lev举起,变轻+y→提升[税]:to raise tax
